name: PigLatinQuote
0:
”Alexa, tell pig latin quote to give me a quote”
”Alexa, ask pig latin quote to say a quote”
”What does that mean”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pig latin quote
des: Want to learn a secret language? This skill will help you train to audibly translate Pig Latin by reading random quotes. Challenge yourself to figure out the quote before asking Alexa to reveal the message. Say, "Alexa, tell Pig Latin Quote give me a Quote". If you want to hear it in plain speak, ask her to reveal the quote.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
